roleset.name: cause astonishment

example.name: It EXP
example.text: Count me in as another person who-1 *T*-1 is simply amazed that there is a student union out there with any sort of power at all .
example.arg: that there is a student union out there with any sort of power at all .

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3, amaze-v.01. Framed by Claire. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. cf frustrate.
